item.title: Deploying a Game With Webpack and Github Pages
item.description: Goal In this post, we’re going to look at deploying a Phaser game with Webpack and GitHub Pages. You’ll need a game already made, even if it’s super bare bones. Phaser has decent tutorials. I’d also recommend the Phaser 3 Project Template. Setup I recently worked up a simple browser-based JavaScript game using the Phaser 3 and Tone.js frameworks. I called it “Get To The Gig” and wrote about it here.
